{{ photo.description }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { PhotoService } from '../photo/photo.service'; import { Photo } from '../photo/photo'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ templateUrl: './photo-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['photo-detail.component.css'], }) export class PhotoDetailsComponent implements OnInit { photo$!: Observable; constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private photoService: PhotoService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.photo$ = this.photoService.findById( this.route.snapshot.params['photoId'] ); } }
